lead_paragraph: Tucked away in a generic midtown office building, Simon Doonan, Barneys's creative director is spinning several thousand recycled Illycaffè espresso tins, cans, bags and paper cups into the department store's annual window extravaganza, which this year has the theme "Have a Foodie Holiday."
snippet: Starting Nov. 16, Barneys's windows will be decked out for the holidays with paeans to 70 gastronomic personalities.

headline.main: Tinsel Town | Simon Doonan's Very Foodie Windows

abstract: Starting Nov. 16, Barneys's windows will be decked out for the holidays with paeans to 70 gastronomic personalities.
